name: WordPress Post Contributors
author: Kishore

sections.description:
This is a WordPress plugin which helps in adding
an option to your posts to enable display of more than one author-name on a post on WordPress.

Demo:

TODO : Ajax filter for showing author on dashboard.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This very simple like other wordpress plugin:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • User Checkbox converted to select box

1.0

  • Add an option to your posts to enable display of more than one author-name on a post on WordPress.
